programme.title: Arsenal vs. Nottingham Forest - English Premier League 2025/2026
programme.desc: In all competitions, Arsenal have won their last six home games against Nottingham Forest by an aggregate score of 19-2. The Gunners are unbeaten in 14 games on home soil against Forest since a 3-1 defeat back in March 1989. Nottingham Forest have won just two out of 16 Premier League matches against Arsenal and both wins came at the City Ground, in 1996-97 and 2022-23.

programme.title: Burnley vs. Liverpool - English Premier League 2025/2026
programme.desc: Burnley have lost 14 of their 18 Premier League matches against Liverpool, including each of their last five in a row since a 1-0 win at Anfield in January 2021. Liverpool have won eight of their nine away Premier League matches at Turf Moor against Burnley, winning the last six in a row. The Reds have won seven away top-flight games in a row against three teams previously: West Brom, Norwich and Crystal Palace.

programme.title: Manchester City vs. Manchester United - English Premier League 2025/2026
programme.desc: Manchester City have won five of their last eight Premier League matches against Manchester United, though they failed to win either game last season for the first time since 2020-21. Manchester United have inflicted 25% of Pep Guardiola’s total home Premier League defeats as Man City manager, with the Red Devils winning four times there against the Spaniard. They are looking for consecutive wins at the Etihad for the first time since March 2021.

programme.title: Liverpool vs. Everton - English Premier League 2025/2026
programme.desc: Liverpool have lost just one of their last 28 home games against Everton in all competitions, winning each of their last four in a row since a 0-2 defeat in February 2021. Only from February 1933 to January 1937 have the Reds ever won five straight home matches against the Toffees. Everton have won just two of their last 29 Premier League Merseyside derbies against Liverpool and have failed to score in five of their last seven.

programme.title: Manchester United vs. Chelsea - English Premier League 2025/2026
programme.desc: Manchester United are unbeaten in their last 12 Premier League home games against Chelsea since a 0-1 defeat in May 2013. Indeed, Chelsea’s win rate of 18% at Old Trafford in the Premier League is their lowest away to any side they have visited 10+ times in the competition. After their 1-0 win in May, Chelsea are looking for successive league victories over Manchester United for the first time since winning three in a row from November 2009 to March 2011 under Carlo Ancelotti. The Blues’ two wins in their last three league games versus the Red Devils are as many as their previous 17 beforehand.

programme.title: Newcastle United vs Barcelona - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD1
programme.desc: This will be the fifth competitive meeting between Newcastle United and Barcelona, with the Magpies winning the first clash 3-2 in September 1997, before losing each of their next three against their Spanish opponents. Barcelona have won 12 of their last 16 UEFA Champions League games against English opposition, scoring 2.1 goals per game on average during that run.

programme.title: FC Bayern Munchen vs Chelsea - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD1

Indeed, only Barcelona have more total wins against them in the European Cup/Champions League.

programme.title: Liverpool vs Everton - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 5
programme.desc: Liverpool have lost just one of their last 28 home games against Everton in all competitions, winning each of their last four in a row since a 0-2 defeat in February 2021. Only from February 1933 to January 1937 have the Reds ever won five straight home matches against the Toffees. Everton have won just two of their last 29 Premier League Merseyside derbies against Liverpool and have failed to score in five of their last seven.

programme.title: Real Madrid vs Espanyol - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 5
programme.desc: Real Madrid have won 24 and drawn three of their last 27 home games against Espanyol in LaLiga, winning the last 10, the best unbeaten run and winning streak at home against Espanyol in their history in the competition. Espanyol have lost 108 of their 178 matches against Real Madrid in LaLiga, the highest number of defeats suffered by any team against another in the history of the competition.

programme.title: Manchester United vs Chelsea - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 5
programme.desc: Manchester United are unbeaten in their last 12 Premier League home games against Chelsea since a 0-1 defeat in May 2013. After their 1-0 win in May, Chelsea are looking for successive league victories over Manchester United for the first time since winning three in a row from November 2009 to March 2011 under Carlo Ancelotti. The Blues’ two wins in their last three league games versus the Red Devils are as many as their previous 17 beforehand.

After their 1-0 win in May, Chelsea are looking for successive league victories over Manchester United for the first time since winning three in a row from November 2009 to March 2011 under Carlo Ancelotti. The Blues’ two wins in their last three league games versus the Red Devils are as many as their previous 17 beforehand.

programme.title: Barcelona vs Valencia - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 4 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Barcelona have not lost any of their last 10 matches against Valencia in LaLiga, their second-best unbeaten run against Los Che in their history in the competition, after a run of 13 matches between 2007 and 2013. Valencia have conceded at least one goal in each of their last 21 away games against FC Barcelona in LaLiga, since a 1-0 win in October 2003 under Rafa Benítez, their worst current run without keeping a clean sheet against the same opponent in the competition.

programme.title: La Liga Highlights 2025/2026

programme.desc: Following their win in February 2025 in their last league encounter, Real Betis have the chance to win consecutive matches against Real Sociedad in LaLiga for the first time since a run of three between 2003 and 2004. programme.title: Girona vs Levante - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 5

programme.title: Villarreal vs Osasuna - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 5

programme.title: Valencia vs Athletic Club - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 5
programme.desc: Valencia have lost their last two LaLiga matches against Athletic Bilbao, failing to score in both. Athletic Club have won three of their last six LaLiga away matches against Valencia, one more victory than in their previous 31 visits to the Valencian ground in the competition.

Nantes won their last home game against Rennes in Ligue 1 but have not won twice on the spin at home against les Rouge et Noir in the top-flight since 1999-2005.

programme.title: Olympique Lyonnais vs Angers SCO - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 5
programme.desc: Lyon have won 76% of their matches against Angers in Ligue 1 in the 21st century, their highest winning percentage against a current top-flight opponent over that period. OL could make it six wins in a row for the first time against SCO in Ligue 1. Lyon lost against Rennes last time out but have only suffered back-to-back defeats in Ligue 1 once in the past year, at the end of last season.

programme.title: Lens vs Lille - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 5
programme.desc: Lens have lost each of their last three matches against Lille in Ligue 1 but have never conceded four defeats in a row in the derby du Nord in the top-flight. Lens have won just one of their last 10 home matches against Lille in Ligue 1, a 1-0 win at Bollaert-Delelis on September 18, 2021.

programme.title: PSV Eindhoven vs R. Union Saint-Gilloise - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD1
programme.desc: This will be the first game between a Dutch and Belgian side in the UEFA Champions League since December 2009. Of the eight all-time meetings between clubs of the two nations in the European Cup/Champions League, Dutch sides have won on just one occasion. PSV have played four previous games against Belgian sides in the European Cup/UEFA Champions League, failing to win each match – all against Anderlecht between 1991 and 2000.

programme.title: AFC Ajax vs FC Internazionale Milano - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD1
programme.desc: Ajax have failed to win any of their four UEFA Champions League games against Internazionale, never facing a side more often in the competition without ever winning. Internazionale are unbeaten across all 12 of their UEFA Champions League games against sides from the Netherlands, never facing sides from a country more often in the competition without suffering defeat.

programme.title: Melbourne City FC (AUS) vs Sanfrecce Hiroshima (JPN) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - East M
programme.desc: This will be the first-ever AFC Champions League Elite meeting between Melbourne City and Sanfrecce Hiroshima; City are winless in each of their two games against Japanese opposition in the competition, while a win for Sanfrecce would see them beat Australian opponents in three consecutive games for the first time in competition history. Melbourne City are winless in each of their last three matches in the AFC Champions League Elite, their longest such run in the competition; in fact, they have begun each of their previous two campaigns in the competition with draws.

programme.title: Gangwon FC (KOR) vs Shanghai Shenhua FC (CHN) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - East MD1
programme.desc: This will be the first AFC Champions League Elite meeting between Gangwon and Shanghai Shenhua, with the former set to play their first-ever game in the competition; Shenhua have lost each of their last two matches against South Korean opposition in the Champions League Elite, another defeat here will see them equal their longest such run in competition history. Shanghai Shenhua lost their most recent AFC Champions League Elite match 0-4 to Kawasaki Frontale on 12 March 2025; failure to score against Gangwon will see them go scoreless in consecutive games for the first time in the competition since May 2011.

programme.title: Gemma Triay Pons (Esp) Delfina Brea Senesi (Arg) vs Marta Ortega Gallego (Esp) Tamara Icardo Alcoris
programme.desc: Roland-Garros, Philippe-Chatrier. New World No.1s Gemma Triay/Delfi Brea meet Marta Ortega/Tamara Icardo with the Paris crown and 2,000 FIP points at stake. Triay/Brea reached the final after outlasting Ustero/Araujo; Ortega/Icardo ousted Sánchez/Josemaría in a statement win. Expect Triay/Brea’s aggressive shifts and overhead control against Ortega/Icardo’s structured patterns and backhand-volley accuracy. Net duels and smart lobs will tell.

programme.title: Arturo Coello (Esp) Agustin Tapia (Arg) vs Alejandro Galan (Esp) Federico Chingotto (Arg) - Men - Fi
programme.desc: Roland-Garros, Philippe-Chatrier. World No.1s Arturo Coello/Agustín Tapia face No.2 Alejandro Galán/Fede Chingotto for Major glory and 2,000 FIP points. Coello/Tapia arrive after straight sets win over Stupaczuk/Lebron; Galán/Chingotto advanced by shutting down Yanguas/Nieto. Expect Coello/Tapia’s aerial power vs Galán/Chingotto’s countering and first-volley precision. Serve+1 and bandeja depth decide.

programme.title: Argentina vs Brazil - Final - 2025 FIBA AmeriCup
programme.desc: South America’s classic rivalry decides the AmeriCup. Argentina are the reigning champions with three titles (2001, 2011, 2022), while Brazil are four-time winners (1984, 1988, 2005, 2009). Argentina lead the senior head-to-head 25–17. Their last AmeriCup meeting was the 2022 final in Recife, which Argentina won 75–73; at the 2019 World Cup second round, Argentina won 87–73. Current FIBA Men’s World Ranking: Argentina No. 8, Brazil No. 12. Expect a tactical game where turnover margin, second-chance points, and late free throws decide it.

programme.title: More than a Match - Derby Of Tunis
programme.desc: Tunis is hosting one of the most passionate football derbies. The passion that this match gives off throughout the city is incredible. The history, the culture, the anecdotes are told through this documentary, the derby of Tunis is more than a game.

Burnley vs Nottingham Forest - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 5
programme.desc: Both sides have scored in six of the last seven league meetings between Burnley and Nottingham Forest, with the only exception a 1-0 win for the Clarets in the Championship in February 2016. After their 2-1 win at Turf Moor on the final day of the 2023-24 season, Nottingham Forest could win back-to-back league meetings against Burnley for the first time since September 2003, and first time in the top-flight since March 1967. The Tricky Trees have never previously won back-to-back league visits to Burnley, with this their 52nd trip.

programme.title: DTM Show 2025-Red Bull Ring
Brest vs Nice - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 5
programme.desc: Brest have won only one of their last nine matches against Nice in Ligue 1, a 1-0 success on April 16, 2023 at Francis-Le Ble. It was also the last time that the Bretons managed to score a goal against Les Aiglons in the top-flight. There have been 1.1 goals per game between Brest and Nice at Francis-Le Ble in Ligue 1 in the 21st century, the lowest average between two current top-flight teams in the same venue over that period.

programme.title: My Faith in Sport
programme.desc: Ramadan is a crucial period in the Islamic calendar but fasting (Sawm) can provide complications for athletes who are trying to compete at the highest level. But to what extent is fasting a negative or can it actually aid performance? We look at the life and adaptation throughout Ramadan of Adam Azim – an unbeaten professional boxer from the UK, Fares El Bakh – a weightlifter who won Qatar’s first ever Olympic gold medal, and Zainab Alema – a rugby player who is aiming to become the first player to represent England wearing a hijab.Experts in Sports Science and Nutrition from Aspetar Clinic, Qatar also add detail of the physical impact athletes encounter during Ramadan

programme.title: Liverpool vs Everton - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 5
programme.desc: Liverpool have lost just one of their last 28 home games against Everton in all competitions, winning each of their last four in a row since a 0-2 defeat in February 2021. Only from February 1933 to January 1937 have the Reds ever won five straight home matches against the Toffees. Everton have won just two of their last 29 Premier League Merseyside derbies against Liverpool and have failed to score in five of their last seven.

programme.title: Brighton and Hove Albion vs Tottenham Hotspur - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 5
programme.desc: Brighton completed a Premier League double over Tottenham Hotspur last season – the only time they have ever won back-to-back league meetings with Spurs. Tottenham Hotspur have lost away to Brighton in both of the last two league seasons but have never before lost three successive visits.

programme.title: Manchester United vs Chelsea - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 5
programme.desc: Manchester United are unbeaten in their last 12 Premier League home games against Chelsea since a 0-1 defeat in May 2013. Indeed, Chelsea’s win rate of 18% at Old Trafford in the Premier League is their lowest away to any side they have visited 10+ times in the competition. After their 1-0 win in May, Chelsea are looking for successive league victories over Manchester United for the first time since winning three in a row from November 2009 to March 2011 under Carlo Ancelotti. The Blues’ two wins in their last three league games versus the Red Devils are as many as their previous 17 beforehand.

programme.title: Fulham vs Brentford - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 5
programme.desc: Fulham completed a Premier League double over Brentford last season and are looking to win three league games in a row over the Bees for the second time, after winning their first three clashes from 1928 to 1929. Brentford have lost two of their three Premier League visits to Craven Cottage, more than their previous 15 league trips to Fulham beforehand, while they could lose twice in a row at Fulham in the league for the first time since January 1954.

programme.title: Al Duhail vs Um Salal - Qatar Stars League 2025/26 - W4
programme.desc: The Qatari League is the official football league in Qatar. The league includes 12 teams. The most famous participating clubs are Al-Sadd, the champions of the last season; Al-Rayyan and Al-Arabi, the popular teams, Al-Duhail and Al-Gharafa, serious contenders for the title every season. The Qatari league includes star names such as Firmino, Verratti, and Qatari Akram Afif, the best player in Asia.

programme.title: Nimes vs Tremblay - LNH Division 1 - French Handball Starligue
programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germains 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

programme.title: HL - World series Triathlon - Dubai - Men’s Final
programme.desc: The worlds top ranked Olympic champions competed for the titles of the last round ( Dubai ) of the World Triathlon Diamond League in an exciting atmosphere over long distances, including a 2000m swim, 80km cycling and 18km non-stop running. It is worth noting that the total prize money for this round was two million dollars.

programme.title: Nikola karabatic 20 Years Of Glory
programme.desc: Renowned as one of the greatest handball players of the century, Nikola retires on May 31 after his final game with PSG Handball. His career concludes with the Paris 2024 Olympic Games. A four-time World Champion, three-time Olympic gold medalist, and three-time World Handball Player of the Year, Nikola plans to take a break from his career to spend more time with his family.
